page.title: 14Local News.
page.content: There are two sources of local news for Olveston and Tockington. The weekly paper called The Thornbury Gazette and the Parish Magazine, Meeting Point, which is printed monthly. The Gazette is available every Friday costing 17p. It mainly covers Thornbury news items with some other interesting local news. The week ending 19 July 1985 included items about a 74 year old Olveston man who was involved in a car chase with the Police. Another article included the proposed expansion of Harnhill Quarry, Olveston. Mr.Turnbull is the new editor of the Meeting Point and it is his job to collate information that people like to read. He also makes sure Church and diary dates are correct.His favourite article is WELCOME introducing folk.
